events.message: The client reported a car accident that occurred at the intersection causing significant front bumper damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords referencing vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to manage this case and assist the client.
Acknowledgment of receipt of the claim has been sent to the claimant via email and SMS.
Requested police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of the driverâ€™s license.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including the accident police report and pictures.
The investigation team began assessing the submitted documents and insurance policy terms.
Investigation concluded confirming that the accident was caused by third-party negligence.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the clarity of the settlement offer and communication.
The claim was officially approved based on investigation results and agreement on settlement terms.
The insurance company issued payment to the claimant for the agreed settlement amount promptly.
The claim file was closed following successful payment and confirmation from the claimant.
